string.value: All of the things that the Black Wings had told you to do were bad. #b#p1013000##k, who had wanted you to help people as the Dragon Master, seems very upset...

#p1013000# says that he can't just let this go and suggests that you go to the #b#m922030001##k in #m220000300# where you met #p1013203# in person. Maybe #p1013203# is still there... Go teach #p1013203# a lesson.


#p1013203##r #a225961##k

#p1013203# tried to appease you but you fought him without mercy. Unfortunately, he escaped... Having discovered the truth, you and #p1013000# decide to do whatever it takes to fight the Black Wings and stop the Black Mage.
All of the things that the Black Wings had us do...were for evil! We wanted to help people but instead, we ended up causing them more problems!
Master, let's go to the #b#m922030001##k in #m220000300#. The house where we met #p1013203# in person. Let's go there and teach #r#p1013203##k a lesson! How could he trick us like this?!
Master, I think you are too cautious at times. We have to right to be angry!

Darn it... We just about had him but he ran away. Then again, a guy who could trick us so many times is probably great at running away. He probably won't show up here again.\r\n#L0##bYeah, you're right. Geez... He was such a suspicious guy. We were so foolish to have believed him!#l\n#k
Well, we could've been more careful. But I still think the deceiver deserves more blame than the deceived! \r\n#L0##bOf course!#l\n#k

They said that their ultimate goal was to revive the Black Mage, the being that destroyed my race and trapped #p1205000# in ice... Master, if I said I wanted to take revenge on the Black Mage, would you help me?\r\n#L0##bOf course!! Personal reasons aside, the Black Mage is an evil being who wants to destroy Maple World. It's only right that an Onyx Dragon and his master stop him!!#l\n#k

Yeah! Master, you and I are on the same page! We lost to #p1013203# this time but next time we'll get him. We won't let the Black Wings revive the Black Mage! For the Onyx Dragons and for Maple World!
Master, let's hurry to the #b#m922030001##k in #m220000300#! #r#p1013203##k is probably still there! Let's make him pay for tricking us!
